name: Assassin
description: Sneaking in the shadows the short blade of their dagger stabs their victims, often to death.

spells.name: backstabber
spells.description: Deals 3x attack when attacking from stealth & stuns the target.

spells.name: front stab
spells.description: Attacks targets in cone inflicting 2x attack and breaking armor.

spells.name: corrupting venom
spells.description: Interrupts all regeneration and deal 1x attack.

spells.name: ice venom
spells.description: Turns poison duration into slow on target.

spells.name: shadow step
spells.description: Move through the shadows and gain a short time of stealth.

spells.name: shadow escape
spells.description: Gain stealth and Regeneration and removes negative effects.

spells.name: potent venom
spells.description: Consumes poison duration and deals direct damage, re-applies poison for 12s.
